alert.note: Alert for Southwest Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 4:21PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...An area of heavy rain will impact portions of south central Owyhee County through 500 PM MDT... At 410 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of heavy rain 7 miles west of Gedney Butte, or 34 miles north of Owyhee. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rain can cause hazardous driving conditions on highway 51 between Grasmere and Bruneau. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Owyhee County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
